title: Daily Open PR List
description: Tracks all Purchase Requests (PRs) waiting for action to prevent requests from getting lost.

title: Open POs by Vendor
description: Shows what has been ordered but not yet delivered. Essential for expediting.

title: Pending Approvals Log
description: Identifies who is holding up the process (Bottleneck identification).

title: Daily Goods Receipt Log
description: Confirms what physically arrived at the warehouse today.

title: Expediting List (Overdue)
description: Highlights orders that are past their promised delivery date. Immediate action required.

title: Rejected PRs Report
description: Tracks why requests are rejected to train staff on proper ordering.

title: Invoice vs. PO Discrepancies
description: Flags invoices that don't match the order price or quantity (accounts payable blocker).

title: New Vendor Creations
description: Tracks how many new suppliers are being added to the system monthly.

title: Items Below Reorder Point
description: Alerts the buyer to restock specific inventory items immediately.

title: Cancelled Orders Log
description: Keeps a record of orders cancelled after being placed.

title: PR to PO Cycle Time
description: Measures internal team speed. How long does it take to process a request?

title: Top 10 Suppliers by Spend
description: Identifies key strategic partners where you spend the most money (Pareto Principle).

title: Spend by Department
description: Shows which internal department is consuming the most budget.

title: Spend by Category
description: Breaks down spend by commodity (e.g., IT, Raw Materials, Office Supplies).

title: Vendor Fill Rate
description: Measures if vendors are delivering the full quantity ordered or partials.

title: On-Time Delivery (OTD)
description: The percentage of orders arriving exactly on the promised date.

title: Price Variance (Standard vs Actual)
description: Tracks if we are paying more than the standard/expected price for items.

title: Buyer Workload Analysis
description: Compares how many POs/Lines each buyer processes.

title: Payment Terms Analysis
description: Tracks average days to pay suppliers (e.g., Net 30 vs Net 60).

title: Emergency / Rush Orders
description: Tracks percentage of orders marked 'Urgent' (indicates poor planning).

title: Total Cost Savings (Hard/Soft)
description: The ROI of the procurement team. Tracks negotiated discounts.

title: Supplier Quality Defect Rate (PPM)
description: Tracks quality issues per million parts. Critical for manufacturing.

title: Maverick Spend Analysis
description: Spend that happens outside of approved contracts or vendors.

title: Supplier Risk/Concentration
description: Calculates risk if a top supplier fails. How much spend is tied to one vendor?

title: Cash Flow Forecasting
description: Predicts future cash outflows based on open POs and due dates.

title: Contract Utilization Rate
description: Are we buying off the contracts we negotiated? (Compliance).

title: Lead Time Variability
description: Tracks how consistent a vendor is. Do they take 5 days once, then 15 days next time?

title: Cost of Acquisition
description: The administrative cost to process a single PO (Salaries + Tech / Total POs).

title: Tail Spend Analysis
description: Analysis of the bottom 20% of spend (usually hundreds of small vendors).

title: Inflation Impact Report
description: Measures price increases of specific SKUs year-over-year.

title: Single vs. Multi-Sourced Ratio
description: Highlights items that only have ONE supplier (High Risk).

title: Supplier Scorecard Aggregate
description: Combines Price, Quality, Delivery, and Service into one score (0-100).
